question.title: Issues Vaadin ComboBox using an AbstractBackEndDataProvider in a UI view
question.body:
I'm developing a Vaadin project which fetches data from an external web API. On the frontend I have a combobox that is outsourced using a AbstractBackEndDataProvider, the details are as follows:

public class housing_projects_data_provider extends AbstractBackEndDataProvider<housing_projects_read_only_dto,String> {

    private Integer                lastkey;
    private String                 searchText;
    private final                  housing_projects_services  services;

    public housing_projects_data_provider(housing_projects_services services)
    {
        this.services = services;
    }

    public void setFilter(String searchText)
    {
        this.searchText=searchText;
        refreshAll();
    }

    @Override
    protected Stream<housing_projects_read_only_dto> fetchFromBackEnd(Query<housing_projects_read_only_dto, String> query) {
        String filter = query.getFilter().orElse(null);
        try {
            if (query.getOffset() == 0) {
                List<housing_projects_read_only_dto> items = services.housing_projects_list(query.getOffset(), query.getLimit(), filter).collectList().block();
                if (!items.isEmpty()) {
                    this.lastkey = items.get(items.size() - 1).getId();
                }
                return items.stream();
            } else {
                List<housing_projects_read_only_dto> items = services.housing_projects_list(query.getOffset(), query.getLimit(), filter).collectList().block();
                if (!items.isEmpty()) {
                    this.lastkey = items.get(items.size() - 1).getId();
                }
                return items.stream();
            }
        } catch (Exception e) {
            return Stream.of(); //Stream of empty Array to return without error
        }
    }

    @Override
    protected int sizeInBackEnd(Query<housing_projects_read_only_dto, String> query)
    {
        String filter=query.getFilter().orElse(this.searchText);
        return services.housing_projects_count(filter).block();
    }

    public void reset() {
        this.lastkey = null;
        refreshAll();
    }

}

Then I have the frontend combobox calling the above data provider as below:

private final housing_projects_services housingprojectservices;
    
public Conveynacing view(housing_projects_services housingprojectservices)
{
    this.housingprojectservices = housingprojectservices;
}

housing_projects_data_provider data_provider = new housing_projects_data_provider(housingprojectservices);

ComboBox<housing_projects_read_only_dto> projects = new ComboBox<>();
projects.setLabel("Select Project");
projects.getStyle().set("--vaadin-combo-box-overlay-width", "350px");
projects.setDataProvider(data_provider);

The issue here is that the debbuger complains saying:

Cannot resolve method 'setDataProvider(housing_projects_data_provider)'

I don't know what the issue really is, as all the methods seem to be initiated correctly. Any idea what I'm doing wrong here?

79794670.body: Thanks Ollitietavainen ...it works now. Much appreciated
